Html:
I followed the deployment guide, and now I'm running into this error:

http://i.imgur.com/JaDI1.png

 

I am a noob and I don't know what to do. Has anyone else had this same problem? Does anybody know how I can fix this?

You need to install ASP.net MVC2.0 to run KiGG

You can do it through Microsoft web platform installer or follow the link http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2010/03/11/asp-net-mvc-2-released.aspx
